INBIFO Institut für biologische Forschung Fuggerstraße 3 D-5000 Köln 90
Dr. A. Zwart Dept. Biological Toxicology TNO-CIVO Toxicology and Nutrition Institute P.O. Box 360 NL-3700 AJ Zeist The Netherlands
Dresdner Bank AG Köln Kto. 3922741 (BLZ 370800 40) Stadtsparkasse Köln 30122154 (BLZ 37050198) Posischeck Köln
Kto. 1320 82-504 (BLZ 37010050) VB1335/AZ-HH
Ihr Zeichen
09 Oct.89
Ihr Schreiben
HHM/MWO
Unser Zeichen
3134TNO.LET
Ref. No.
Köln 28 Nov.89
Re .: Lung function determinations for the INBIFO study P 0500/3134 and the CRC study B6005
Dear Doctor Zwart:
Thank you very much for submitting your preliminary reports to CRC and INBIFO regarding the lung function determinations carried out in the above mentioned studies. We discussed both reports and would like to make the following comments.
With regard to the determinations of tidal volume, breathing fre- quency, and ventilatory flow, we would like not only a tabulation of mean values and standard deviations but also a tabulation of the individual data for each of the rats. This is in accordance with GLP guidelines and would allow us to perform our own statis- tical evaluation on these data. A detailed discussion of assumed outliers would be helpful. We would ask to include a discussion of the relevance of the physiological data obtained in view of the pronounced restraint of the rats while the measurements were being made.
We are not quite sure about the exact definition of the pressure variable in the numerator of the term describing the transfer im- pedance. For example, in your paper coauthored by F. Oostveen (a) the pressure difference between thorax and mouth seems to be meant instead of the pressure delivered to the thorax as stated in a recent TNO newsletter (b) .
- 2 -
(a) Transfer Impedance of Awake Rats Measured by the Forced Oscillation Technique, in press
(b) A. Zwart, Lung Mechanical Properties Measured in Awake Re- strained Small Experimental Animals, Toxicology Tribune 4 (1988) Sitz der Gesellschaft: Köln HR B 367, 29. Oktober 1959 Institutsleiter und Geschäftsführer: Dr. med. Ulrich Hackenberg
0185
INBIFO Institut für biologische Forschung GmbH
DEPT. BC
2029223968

paragraphs.content: Telefon: Porz (02203) 3031 Telefax: (02203) 303362 Telex: 8874 675 inbi d
INBIFO Institut für biologische Forschung Fuggerstraße 3 D-5000 Köln 90
Dr. A. Zwart Dept. Biological Toxicology TNO-CIVO Toxicology and Nutrition Institute P.O. Box 360 NL-3700 AJ Zeist The Netherlands
Dresdner Bank AG Köln Kto. 3922741 (BLZ 370800 40) Stadtsparkasse Köln 30122154 (BLZ 37050198) Posischeck Köln
Re .: Lung function determinations for the INBIFO study P 0500/3134 and the CRC study B6005

Thank you very much for submitting your preliminary reports to CRC and INBIFO regarding the lung function determinations carried out in the above mentioned studies. We discussed both reports and would like to make the following comments.

With regard to the determinations of tidal volume, breathing fre- quency, and ventilatory flow, we would like not only a tabulation of mean values and standard deviations but also a tabulation of the individual data for each of the rats. This is in accordance with GLP guidelines and would allow us to perform our own statis- tical evaluation on these data. A detailed discussion of assumed outliers would be helpful. We would ask to include a discussion of the relevance of the physiological data obtained in view of the pronounced restraint of the rats while the measurements were being made.

We are not quite sure about the exact definition of the pressure variable in the numerator of the term describing the transfer im- pedance. For example, in your paper coauthored by F. Oostveen (a) the pressure difference between thorax and mouth seems to be meant instead of the pressure delivered to the thorax as stated in a recent TNO newsletter (b) .
(a) Transfer Impedance of Awake Rats Measured by the Forced Oscillation Technique, in press

(b) A. Zwart, Lung Mechanical Properties Measured in Awake Re- strained Small Experimental Animals, Toxicology Tribune 4 (1988) Sitz der Gesellschaft: Köln HR B 367, 29. Oktober 1959 Institutsleiter und Geschäftsführer: Dr. med. Ulrich Hackenberg
INBIFO Institut für biologische Forschung GmbH
